name: AssetLinkPipe
description:
Converts a managed object into a context-aware URL, depending on its type and fragments. Usage:

Example :
 {{ managedObject | assetLink }} <!-- e.g. '/device/<moId>' or '/group/<moId> -->
rawdescription:
Converts a managed object into a context-aware URL, depending on its type and fragments.
Usage:

```html
 {{ managedObject | assetLink }} <!-- e.g. '/device/<moId>' or '/group/<moId> -->
```
